title: Capital One
meta_description: A visual helper for the 5 requirements needed for a Capital One password on their website and mobile apps.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Must have at least one letter and one number
Cannot be the same as your username
Can only use the following symbols: -_./\@$*&!#

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Previously-used passwords may be flagged when creating a new password.
